commentBody:
As a long-time political junkie, I could almost look forward to the Republican convention. I could almost wallow in the schadenfreude of seeing the likes of Ryan and McConnell reap what they have sown.

But whatever entertainment I might have found is overwhelmed both by the fear that Mr. Trump could actually win this election and by the harm he has already done during his candidacy.

Somehow I had held onto the idea that the GOP stalwarts cared at least a little about this country. But I was wrong.
